name: Steerbear
description:
Stay alive on a sinking ship, which is quickly being filled with water.

Breaches in the ship's hull keep leaking water. Find repair kits to fix the holes or flee to other rooms if it is too late. Be on the lookout for repair kits, be tactical about which leaks to fix and be quick!

Made for Ludum Dare 42.

Post your result in the comments and you'll be a challenger for the high score.

Controls:
Move with the arrow keys.
Repair leaks and mount ladders with Z.

Programming: Skelpdar
Art: Alkuuda
